channel.title: Illusionist Rework
channel.description:
Illusionist new Ability: Mirror Dummy: Use on a Player to have them appear to be _ (Occupied, Changed Targets, Prevented, Possessed, __ Visited the Princess,Etc) This ability is of 3 uses It is similar to the Defile Ability
Illusionist keeps their mental warp ability.
In addition they keep their Physic Message Ability.
The Illusionist has a new Passive: "Shadow of Deception". This makes it so that the first time you are investigated by a sheriff you will appear "NS".
The Illusionist has a Day Ability that replaces Miss direct, it is entitled "Crimson of the Black Sun." This ability makes the Player that it is used on appear to be "Poisoned".
And this is my illusionist Rework. Questions I will anwser

item.title: Illusionist Rework
item.dc:creator: Braixen
item.description:
Illusionist new Ability: Mirror Dummy: Use on a Player to have them appear to be _ (Occupied, Changed Targets, Prevented, Possessed, __ Visited the Princess,Etc)
This ability is of 3 uses
It is similar to the Defile Ability

Illusionist keeps their mental warp ability.

In addition they keep their Physic Message Ability.

The Illusionist has a new Passive: “Shadow of Deception”. This makes it so that the first time you are investigated by a sheriff you will appear “NS”.

The Illusionist has a Day Ability that replaces Miss direct, it is entitled “Crimson of the Black Sun.” This ability makes the Player that it is used on appear to be “Poisoned”.

And this is my illusionist Rework. Questions I will anwser
